Name: Automated Bid Management Integration
description_c: We should integrate an automated bid management system that can adjust bids based on performance metrics in real-time. This would save hours of manual work and improve campaign performance significantly.

Name: Advanced Analytics Dashboard Training
description_c: Organize comprehensive training sessions on advanced analytics features in Google Ads and Microsoft Ads. Many team members are not utilizing the full potential of these platforms.

Name: Weekly Performance Review Process
description_c: Implement a structured weekly performance review process where each team member presents their top performing and underperforming campaigns with actionable insights.

Name: Landing Page A/B Testing Tool
description_c: Invest in a dedicated landing page A/B testing tool like Unbounce or Optimizely. Current manual testing methods are time-consuming and lack statistical significance.

Name: Cross-Platform Campaign Coordination
description_c: Establish a standardized process for coordinating campaigns across Google Ads, Microsoft Ads, and Facebook Ads to ensure consistent messaging and avoid budget conflicts.

Name: Google Ads Scripts Workshop
description_c: Organize hands-on workshops for writing and implementing Google Ads scripts. This would help automate routine tasks and improve account management efficiency.

Name: Budget Allocation Dashboard
description_c: Create a centralized dashboard that shows real-time budget allocation across all campaigns and platforms. This would help prevent overspending and optimize budget distribution.

Name: Keyword Research Best Practices Guide
description_c: Develop a comprehensive guide for keyword research that includes tool recommendations, research methodologies, and competitor analysis techniques.

Name: Client Reporting Automation
description_c: Implement automated client reporting using tools like Data Studio or Supermetrics to reduce manual report creation time and improve data accuracy.

Name: Quality Score Optimization Training
description_c: Provide specialized training on Quality Score factors and optimization techniques. Many campaigns could benefit from improved Quality Scores to reduce costs.

Name: Campaign Launch Checklist
description_c: Create a standardized checklist for campaign launches to ensure all settings are properly configured and tracking is in place before going live.

Name: Competitor Analysis Tool
description_c: Invest in a comprehensive competitor analysis tool like SEMrush or SpyFu to better understand competitor strategies and identify new opportunities.

Name: Conversion Tracking Audit Process
description_c: Establish a monthly process for auditing conversion tracking across all accounts to ensure data accuracy and identify tracking issues early.

Name: Advanced Excel for PPC Training
description_c: Provide training on advanced Excel functions and pivot tables specifically for PPC data analysis. This would improve our ability to analyze large datasets efficiently.

Name: Creative Asset Management System
description_c: Implement a centralized system for managing creative assets across all campaigns. This would improve organization and make it easier to reuse successful creatives.
